articles.author: By KEN MORITSUGU and RALPH JENNINGS Associated Press
articles.title: Taiwan leader gets election boost from unlikely place: China
articles.description: TAIPEI, Taiwan (AP) — A year ago, Taiwan's leader was on the ropes. Then she got a boost from an unexpected corner: Chinese President Xi Jinping.
articles.content:
TAIPEI, Taiwan (AP) A year ago, Taiwan's leader was on the ropes. Then she got a boost from an unexpected corner: Chinese President Xi Jinping.
Polls indicate that President Tsai Ing-wen is poised to win a second four-year term on Saturday, a remarkable turn… [+4625 chars]

articles.title: Hoover, Goodwin help spark Wofford to 67-62 win at Samford
articles.description: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) — Nathan Hoover scored 22 points with four 3-pointers and Chevez Goodwin's dunk with two minutes left gave Wofford the lead for good, beating Samford 67-62 on Wednesday night.
articles.content:
